title: Microsoft Corp. stock underperforms Friday when compared to competitors
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       slipped 0.15% to $428.74 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around rough trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.14% to 5,234.18 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.77% to 39,475.90. The stock's fall snapped a four-day winning streak. Microsoft Corp. closed $2.08 below its 52-week high ($430.82), which the company reached on March 21st. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Friday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       rose 0.53% to $172.28, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       rose 2.04% to $151.77, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       rose 2.15% to $150.77. Trading volume (17.2 M) remained 6.3 million below its 50-day average volume of 23.5 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use.
